0: Well, you seem to be full of holiday cheer.
1:
What do you mean "what am I supposed to be?" 
Isn't it obvious?
2: I'm a helper. I'm being useful, okay?
3:
You done laughing and calling me names? 
Then help me out.

0: Wow! Everyone is so sparkly!
1: Everyone is having fun! Challua is happy!
2: I hope next year is just as fun!

0: Happy Mew Year!
1: One meowr year down! Grrreat job!
2: So, what did mew wish for this year?
3: Mew-Mew's wish? That's a secret!

0: 会いにきてくれてありがとう！
1: ３年かあ、いろんなことがあったけど
2: 僕は進んでいくよ。
3: また会おうね！

0:
今年で皆さんと
出会ってから３年です。
1:
改めて、
いつもありがとうございます。
2:
これからも皆さんと
一緒に過ごしたいです。
3: よろしくお願いします。

0: 来てくれたのだな！待っていたぞ！
1:
みなと共に過ごして
３年がたったのだな。
2: これからも共に進もう。
3: よろしく頼む。

0: You're here!
1: Are you ready to get the party started?
2:
I just wanted to say 
thanks—for everything.
3: I hope we'll keep on adventuring together.

0: Happy 2nd Flipperversary.
1:
I'm glad we can celebrate it 
again this year.
2: Let's enjoy it to the fullest.
3:
I look forward to seeing 
where our adventures take us.

0: Everyone's finally here!
1:
We couldn't have made it this far 
without your support.
2: We're truly grateful.
3:
Now then, 
shall we celebrate in earnest?

0: I'm so happy we met 2 years ago!
1: Stella said there's going to be a party!
2: Hehe, I love parties!
3: 10 more days until then!

0: Just 9 more days till we party!
1: Hard to believe it's been 2 years.
2: Sea or sky, the Crimson Blades soar on!
3: And you're coming along for the ride!

0: The 2nd Anniversary approaches!
1: We're even hosting a party!
2: Alk's catering will be most delicious!
3: Only 8 more days to go!

0: We're all very excited for the party.
1: Just 7 more days...
2: It's an honor to journey with you.
3: Perhaps I'll let loose for once.

0: 6 more days to the party, huh?
1: Want some candy to celebrate?
2: Ahaha, pretty tasty, right?
3: Anyway, thanks for another year.

0: I have been waiting for this day.
1: The 2nd Anniversary draws near.
2: Will the Hero make his Red Soup?
3: 5 more days, and we feast!

0: Thanks for coming!
1: I haven't been here long, but...
2: I'm excited to celebrate with you!
3: 4 more days, and the real fun begins.

0: 2 years... That's wild.
1: Huh? Only 3 days till the anniversary?
2: A speech?! Uh, um...
3: Th-thank you for playing.

0: Oh, there you are!
1: Just 2 more days till the anniversary!
2: Want me to show you around Shibuya?
3: I'll show you how we like to party!

0: The anniversary starts tomorrow!
1: Wait, Yumu's not here yet?!
2: Aw jeez, let me go get him!
3: Anyway, thanks for playing!

0: We're all having a party!
1: A lot's happened in this year and a half, huh?
2: I'm sure that'll continue into the future, but we'll be fine!
3: Oh, and I made a special cake, so you better look forward to it!

0: It's been a year and a half since I met you all.
1: Sonia and I have worked hard on a dance to celebrate.
2: I hope you will enjoy it.
3: I look forward to seeing where our adventures take us.

0: So, you've finally arrived!
1: Lately, the others have been treating me like a toy, but...
2: If it puts a smile on everyone's face, I can endure it.
3: Now, go forth, Champions! We're counting on you!

0: Oho, I always appreciate the help, youngsters!
1: I must say, 'tis always a treat hearing about your adventures.
2: And I hope to hear about many more in the future!
3: Be sure to visit me and the trees every once in a while, ya hear?

0: Hey, how's it going?
1: We've been buds for a while now, huh?
2: Heh, then I guess this goes without saying, but...
3: I've got your back, so let's get out there and fight.

0: OMG, we've reached the one and a half year Flipperversary!
1: Huh? I'm a little early? Aw, come on, the early bird gets the worm, right?
2: We totally need to go on more quests and stuff!
3: So... How about tomorrow? Where should we go?

0: Looks like you've got a seat of honor in our celebration. Congratulations.
1: I'm... not accustomed to such... festivity.
2: Not that I dislike it...
3: Am I being too cold? Sorry, this is the best I can do...

0: Hahaha! Happy Flipperversary!
1: How's life treating you, my lovely companions?
2: Nothing wrong with taking a short break to stop and reflect on our memories.
3: May we make many more in the future!

0: The love and support you've given us over the last year and a half was incredible.
1: So, I hope you will allow me to say a few words of thanks.
2: Though our journey has been arduous...
3: I hope we retain your favor.

0: It is with the utmost respect that I give you my congratulations.
1: Hehe, how was that for a royal decree?
2: Fighting alongside you has become a great source of pride for me.
3: May our adventures continue on!

0: I thank you for the invitation to this celebration.
1: Heh... This place is as relaxed as ever, I see.
2: But I suppose rest is necessary from time to time.
3: Perhaps I will join you, just this once.

0: This, my friends, is a matter of great importance.
1: Rejoice, for as we speak, we prepare for a grand celebration.
2: They say time flies by in the blink of an eye.
3: For what time we have, let us spend this day together to make merry.

0: The true celebration will commence shortly!
1: Once again, I wish you a happy Flipperversary and give you my thanks!
2: May you continue to watch over our adventures...
3: And see your days filled with joy!

0: Thanks for an awesome year, guys!
1: Can't believe it's already been a year.
2: Our journey's only just getting started.
3: Here's to many more adventures together!

0: Happy Flipperversary.
1: It's been a year since we first met.
2:
I appreciate all the time 
we've spent together.
3:
A year is a long time, but I plan 
on being with you for longer.

0:
Today marks a year since 
our adventure began.
1:
I couldn't have made it 
this far without you.
2:
It's a lot to ask, but I hope 
you'll keep lending us your strength.
3:
The true champions 
here are all of you!

0: Only 10 more days! The Flipperversary is almost here!
1: Want to celebrate together?
2: Let's play again soon!

0: Don't you look chipper.
1: It's about to get noisy around these parts.
2: 9 more days... You'll be here, right?

0: Thanks for always helping out!
1: 8 days left, huh? Time sure flies by!
2: Unfurl the sails! Full speed ahead!

0: Hey there! What's good with you?
1: Think you can, like, show up every day?
2: Just 7 days to go! You won't forget, right?

0: Heya, thanks for showing up!
1: 6 days, then it's festival time. You ready to party?
2: Make sure you're free on the big day!

0: Such an important occasion deserves celebration.
1: We only made it this far thanks to you.
2: Remember: the main event is 5 days from now!

0: I'm glad to see you today! Thanks for coming!
1: Time flies by so fast! 4 more days... I can't wait!
2: There's nobody else I'd rather celebrate with!

0: I'm here to oversee the festivities.
1: May your continued journey be blessed.
2: I do hope you're joining us in 3 days for the main event.

0: I am grateful for your presence today.
1: Only 2 days remain until the celebration.
2: I hope you will continue to grace us with your presence.

0: Are you ready to have some fun?
1: One more day until Flipperversary!
2: I foresee a great future ahead of us!
